name: The Last Commander
description:
Game Goals
  • You are the last remaining commander.
  • Develop your sector over 50 days and defend it from invading alien spaceships.

Game Play

  • Construct buildings on hexagon-shaped terrain tiles.
  • There are combinations that create synergy between each building.
  • Use synergy/terrain to build the best combination.

Battle

  • 17 battles occur over 50 days.
  • Defend all 17 battles to win the game.

Resource Management

  • Evaluation resources for hope/administration/education exist.
  • Manage your evaluation resources by managing complaints.
